dmca.title: Game DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market

works.description:
The copyrighted work is a weather  
application and the weather information displayed within the application  
which includes current conditions, hourly forecasts, short-term forecasts,
 
5 day long-term forecasts, weather warnings, and radar maps for locations 

as selected by the application user.  The application is marketed under
the  
trademarked name "WeatherEye".
